title: A1 Vocabulary - Review 2
subject: english
description: Practice vocabulary for animals, food, places, numbers, common adjectives, and question words.

questions.text: We go to the _____ to buy food.
questions.explanation: A shop (or supermarket/market) is where you buy things.
Apples are a type of fruit.
We use 'What' to ask about things like names ('What is your name?').
Hot and Cold are opposites describing temperature.
The bus is a mode of transport.
Birds use their wings to fly. (Note: 'Fly' is common A1 vocab often associated with Bird).

questions.text: Chicken and Beef are types of _____.
The car is very _____. It costs a lot of money.
questions.explanation: If something costs a lot of money, it is expensive.

questions.text: Where is the cat? It is _____ the table.
questions.explanation: 'Under' is a preposition of place commonly used with furniture.

questions.text: I like to drink _____ in the morning.
questions.explanation: Coffee is a common morning drink. Bread, rice, and meat are foods.

questions.text: This problem is not easy. It is _____.
_____ is that man? He is my teacher.
questions.explanation: We use 'Who' to ask about people.
